reviewText: Great dvd. I was surprised at the quality of this DVD. If you like very attractive girls with narural breasts you will like this DVD.

These Soft Touch releases are bizarre, with most of them having these really weird voice-over narrations that are irritating and don't make any sense. I can't figure out if they're supposed to be funny or what, but in the case of this DVD the narration is surrealistic and strange, just plain annoying and has absolutely no reason to be there.

Getting past that, there are some good-looking South American women to be seen here, in basically two different settings: a rather wild pool party, and then (as the title implies) a boat party, although more time is devoted to the pool party. Most of them are wearing tiny thong bikinis that get removed or partly removed when they're dancing around and splashing in the water. Even though South American women aren't known for it, there are some really great breasts to be seen.

There is even some explicit nudity here, although not enough, and not enough of the right girls' showing it.

Biggest gripes (aside from the voiceover): The pool party scene has probably 75 people in it, so no one girl shows up very well; some footage is recycled during the course of the production; and there are both men and women around. I have no idea how this thing was staged or what really was going on here to get all of these girls outside dancing naked, but the voiceover keeps imploring that is a "lesbian pool party" in this ridiculous fake French accent.

Overall, not a bad DVD for what it is, but certainly not the best.

This DVD would be very entertaining for someone who has never seen a real porn before.  It has all the essentials: thongs, legs, breasts, boobs, thongs (did I say that already?)  The only thing it's missing is action.  I bought this DVD looking for action and I was very disappointed.  The one lesbian scene they do have, THEY DON'T SHOW.  The cameraman is focused on the wrong thing. Other than that I guess it's a decent DVD, I was just looking for something a little more hardcore.

This is a very entertaining DVD which was filmed exceptionally well!!!I hope other producers of mature DVDS take note. This one had a very interesting soundtrack/dialogue and was filmed in such a way that even though all the women in here were not perfect it showed their beauty through exceptional filming and the creativity of the producers. I highly recommend this film-very erotic!
